overview: Moments after being brutally violated, a once starry-eyed girl named Violet wonders through the night traumatized and completely changed. Violet begins to track down the men who have hurt her, determined not to be a compliant victim anymore, and take matters into her own hands. During her blood-soaked journey, she meets a boy named Josh at the one place she gets solace - her favorite lake. Will Josh give her the closure she needs or will revenge be the only way for her to heal?
title: Violet
